title: High latency since recent patch
body:
Prior to this patch I'd get the usual latency in the evening peak however now (post patch) I'm lagging all day, everyday.
It comes in sudden spikes every time I fight, another enemy champ enters my screen and roughly every 10 secs while csing in the laning phase.
It topped out at approx 400ms and lasted for approx 20sec before going below 100ms.

I'm aware that my ISP is a load of garbage and I need to fix that, however it's strange for it to occur just because I updated the game.
Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated lads <3

replies.body: If this is only happening during peak hours then your ISP could be changing how it routes to our game servers.  Grab WinMTR and run a traceroute to OCE 103.240.227.5.  Run it for a few minutes so we can get a good idea of how your're reaching the game.  If possible, run one during off hours too so we can get a comparison.  If something is indeed going on with your ISP, you can give those logs to them for further investigation.  I hope that helps!

Thanks but,

>  now (post patch) I'm lagging all day, everyday.

Aha, sorry for missing that.  My suggestion in this case would be to run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as it does sound like your network is pretty unstable.  The steps in that guide should help resolve any local factors that might be causing this.

If it doesn't work, then proceed with grabbing [WinMTR ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)and let me know the results.
